name: House Cleaning Hidden Object Game – Home Makeover
name_original: House Cleaning Hidden Object Game – Home Makeover
description:
✨ The best family game is finally here! Clean up the mess from the dirty kitchen and untidy rooms and do the complete house makeover. Don't escape the messy room, clean up and experience the greatest adventure in your life. Download House Cleaning Hidden Object Game – Home Makeover, the best fun clean up game for family. This seek and find game is fantastic for all the girls who like kitchen cleaning and cooking games and object searching games with multiple levels.

House Cleaning Hidden Object Game – Home Makeover features:

🔍 Kitchen adventure game free localized into 15 languages!
🚮 More than 1000 hidden objects to find in the messy kitchen!
🔍 Home cleaning game with levels full of mystery hidden objects!
🚮 Fantastic 3D game for girls and boys, old and young!
🔍 Find the hidden object from the menu below & click on it!
🚮 Click on the magnifying glass button to use the hint for help!
🔍 Zoom in the picture to find the house hidden objects easily!
🚮 Move the picture when it is zoomed to find hidden objects!
🔍 Zoom out at any moment you like to see the messy rooms again!


✨ Additional House Cleaning Hidden Object Game – Home Makeover features!!!

🚮 Picture search - to find hidden objects quickly and easily!
🔍 Silhouette of the hidden object – a challenging level for finding items!
🚮 Word scramble game level – find hidden figures in anagrams!
🔍 Flashlight or a night mode level – use the light to seek for items!
🚮 Card matching game – a memory game with colorful cards to pair!
🔍 Find the Difference – spot the difference among the hidden objects!
🚮 Time limit game - Bonus level to train your brain and concentration!

✨ Find hidden objects in the picture of the messy house written on the cards below! Click on the “magnifying glass” button when you get stuck to use help. Find hidden figures while house cleaning when you are given a picture or a silhouette and search for missing items hidden in anagrams. Use a flashlight to find hidden objects in pictures in the dark. There is a special level as a time limit game free, where the timer brings a dramatic moment to this search and find game. Play other mini games for brain that will entertain you for hours like find the difference, logic games, brain teasers, memory games with cards and puzzle games.

The best House Cleaning Hidden Object Game – Home Makeover games adventure!

✨ Download house cleaning games for girls with levels to seek and find hidden objects and have fun all day. messy house makeover game is the best object searching game to train your brain and boost your concentration. Kitchen cleaning games with levels can be very interesting, but House Cleaning Hidden Object Game – Home Makeover is more than this. Discover all the house secrets and clean the mess – play the best room cleaning game for women, men, girls and boys. You don't need a do to list for your chores. Just play the best house cleaning puzzle hidden object games free download 2019 and enjoy the adventure!
